extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Product and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is running an affected version of PAScal, PASconnect, PASmotion, PNOZmulti Configurator, or PNOZmulti Configurator LTS.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running an affected version?

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Using Untrusted Files
extracted_playbook.description: Do not use .zip or .par files from untrusted sources. Contact local Pilz support if loading a file from an untrusted source is necessary.

extracted_playbook.title: Check for Fixed Version
extracted_playbook.description: Visit the Pilz Shop to check for and download the fixed version of the affected product.
